trans-unit.source: Retrieves the last extended function return value

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the last extended function return value

target.mrk: Retrieves the last extended function return value

trans-unit.source: Note that not all the functions returns the extended value.

seg-source.mrk: Note that not all the functions returns the extended value.

target.mrk: Note that not all the functions returns the extended value.

trans-unit.source: For example, _WinAPI_CreateDIB() function returns a pointer to the location of the DIB bit values.

seg-source.mrk: For example, _WinAPI_CreateDIB() function returns a pointer to the location of the DIB bit values.

target.mrk: For example, _WinAPI_CreateDIB() function returns a pointer to the location of the DIB bit values.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_GetExtended() must be called immediately after calling the appropriate function.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetExtended() must be called immediately after calling the appropriate function.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetExtended() must be called immediately after calling the appropriate function.
